home-hero-subtitle: A place to grow, worship, and serve together.
home-founder-bio: Bishop Guy Léonce BAYONG, born December 18, 1973, is a visionary leader, author, and developer of transformative programs. Married to Pst Archange Mireille Bayong, he has 6 children and a passion for empowering the church and community.
home-vision-text: Mission APIM: To inspire and stimulate a generation with transformative capacities for cities and nations.
home-about-text: Nous sommes A.P.I.M. is a community dedicated to spiritual growth, faith, and impact across nations.
home-about-text2: Our branches, programs, and ministries focus on education, media, health, and community development.

give-intro: Members and visitors can support the church financially through various giving options. Every contribution helps us carry out our mission and serve the community.

give-option-inperson: In-person Giving: Give during church services or at the church office.

give-designation-projects: Special Projects – Contribute to special initiatives and events.
